WELCOME.CONTENT_FIRST: You start the service in the elite ground team Impact Squad. As a tactical unit, you will operate in the enemy's deep hinterland.
WELCOME.CONTENT_SECOND: Remember! By serving on the Impact Squad, you can gain a lot or lose everything! So don't ignore the enemy and carry out orders with the utmost care, and you won't miss honors, promotions and awards! Over time, you may get access to the full range of the latest generation of mechs and combat kits, as well as an expanded range of resources.

OBJECTIVES.CONTENT:
- Clean the surface of the planet from unwanted organic elements in the form of an insectoid living force.

- Destroy the nests of alien insectoid forms inhabiting the planet.

- Conduct the rescue of research teams and civilian workers cut off by the actions of hostile organisms.

- Direct combat operations on the surface of a planet by enabling it to be terraformed and colonized.

GAME_ITEMS.HEADER: At your disposal will be placed

MECHS.CONTENT:
Take control of the combat mechs and traverse the planet. Use mech-enhancing technologies to increase your chances on missions. Available modules:

- supporting locomotives,

- providing combat support,

- improving defense systems,

- expanding knowledge about opponents and their places of existence.

WEAPONS.CONTENT:
Confront alien insectoid forms using a wide arsenal of weapons that will cause a lot of destruction in alien nests.

Weapon types available: cannon, ray gun, bio throwers, artillery and energy weapons.

SUPPORT.CONTENT:
Use various items, so that you will create a personalized equipment that will support you during the game.

You can choose from sets:

- defensive (first aid and repair),

- offensive (different types of mines).

INFO.TITLE: DAO - manage Crypto Mayhem
INFO.WHO: ADRIA token holders can take part in the decision-making process and influence the future direction of the project.
INFO.DECISION:
What do you influence?

- Decision what to make in the game (during game development).

- Possibility to propose your own changes in game, which team will verify.

- Decision what Adria Corp should do with collected pool ADRIA in game (collected pool from fee transaction).
INFO.IMPORTANT: Important: Each wallet can vote once per question and your vote power is set to one.

VOTES_WEIGHT.MINIMUM_TEXT: To be able to vote, you have to own at least the first level of voting power.

VOTES.INFO:
The voting power is determined by a 4-level scale. The weight of your votes is influenced by:

- the number of tokens hold,
- the time of the storage of tokens in the wallet

EARLY_ACCESS.HEADER:
Your extraterrestrial adventure will begin
on December 13th!

INFO.TITLE: Dear Colonizers!
INFO.MESSAGE:
The Crypto Mayhem tech team worked hard through the last months to let you explore outer space. Soon your patience will pay off and you will be granted the Top-Down Shooter early access.

Prepare yourself for gory fights with alien critters full of highly needed biomass.
INFO.REMINDER:
Note: To play Crypto Mayhem Top-Down Shooter you have to be an ADRIA or Crypto Mayhem NFT holder.

If you are not ADRIA or Crypto Mayhem NFT holder yet, donâ€™t worry! Soon we will give you an opportunity to get it and play the Top-Down Shooter.

Follow our social media not to miss any updates!

EARLY_ACCESS.INVESTORS: If you are ADRIA or Crypto Mayhem NFT holder donâ€™t forget to fill out the Top-Down Shooter beta testers form to get access to the exclusive testers group.
